DOC.brief_summary: Aim of this study is to evaluate the effectiveness of osteopathy in changing quality of life in a large sample of naive patients undergoing osteopathic manipulative treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Epidemiological Study of Quality of Life in Osteopathy
DOC.criteria: older than 18 years old affected by muscleskeletal disorder younger than 18 years old OMT undertaken during the last 12 months Any manual therapy received during the last 12 months
